title: First Magyc
description: Welcome to Demona, a land where music is the most powerful form of magyc.Ria Westerfield had never heard of Demona or the Path, but when she helps a mysterious Guardian who is trapped between worlds, she is embroiled in his struggle to protect his home and the very force of life itself.At first glance, this may look like Ria's story, but this tale belongs to everyone who fights to save magyc - Witches, assassins, princesses, and even Death Himself.Will the Guardians and their allies triumph or will Demons and sorcerers send Demona into the throes of Chaos and the End of Times?
author: Nicole DragonBeck
